definition: position/location/place/seat/classifier for people (honorific)/classifier for binary bits (e.g. 十六位 16-bit or 2 bytes)/(physics) potential

sentences.english: The body position is all the same with each medical image examination.

sentences.english: Sometimes urinates the sudden stop, changes when the body posture can continue to urinate.

sentences.english: The term "breech presentation" refers to the mother's position on the delivery table while giving birth.
sentences.chinese: “臀先露”定义为产妇分娩时在产床上的体位。

sentences.english: The best position for beginners is with the receiver lying on his back with the giver lying on the stomach along side.
sentences.chinese: 初学者的最佳体位是女方仰卧而男方趴在旁边。

sentences.english: Benign paroxysmal positional vertigo (BPPV) is the most frequent vestibular disorder.
sentences.chinese: 良性阵发性体位性眩晕是最常见的前庭病症。

sentences.english: Location-specific information is what we want, especially when we are travelling.
sentences.chinese: 我们需要的正是具体位置信息，尤其是在旅游的时候。

sentences.english: In a dream I still don't remember hundreds of good cousin home location.
sentences.chinese: 在梦里我依然不记得百良表哥家的具体位置。

sentences.english: Shenzhen Dongsheng Plastic Pigment Products Factory Shenzhen City Dongsheng Plastic Pigment Products…

sentences.english: The patients were randomly divided into two groups according to the body position during the measurement, namely seated group and side-lay group.
sentences.chinese: 根据患者测腋温时的体位随机分为坐位组和卧位组。

sentences.english: This position is best for sleepy morning sex.
sentences.chinese: 这个体位似醒非醒的晨光性爱最佳。

sentences.english: The horizontal posture is better than vertical in the measurement of human body heat energy.
sentences.chinese: 在人体测量时取水平体位较垂直体位为佳。

sentences.chinese: 在人体测量时取水平体位较垂直体位为佳。

sentences.english: The dressing was changed to avoid excessive body position changes after the end of excessive, and prevent the occurrence of syncope.
sentences.chinese: 避免换药结束后改变体位过快过猛，防止晕厥的发生。

sentences.english: Often I can even feel the position of my body on the bed.
sentences.chinese: 我就时常能意识到自身在床上的具体位置。

sentences.english: Consequently, a change in leg position could affect the tension of lumbosacral vessels.
sentences.chinese: 因此，腿部体位的改变能够影响腰骶部血管的张力。
